WorkItem.ClosedComment: We're closing the issue, because we already have the issue. It's already fixed for the next version, and we've already posted the workaround in the meantime. Not that the mean time is going to last much longer, because I'm posting 2.3.11 shortly.
WorkItem.Description:
regarding to my posts on http://rawr.codeplex.com/Thread/View.aspx?ThreadId=197903
Â 
In german language the mouse over tool tip of the T10 set items doesnt shows the cost of the T10 set. E.g. item=50396 "Mantelung des purpurroten Akolyten".
Error message "drops from unknown boss in icecrwon...wowhead lacks data" Its all the same, if i refresh from wowhead or armory.
But if i switch to english language it works and it shows "purchasable with 60[ Emblem of Frost]".
But if i right click and edit the item, the item has still a zero Cost value (bottom center of the window). And its not available for the cost optimizer.
So i have to type in manually in the bottom center of the window the correct cost value.
WorkItem.Summary: [Items] Cost of T10 Set doesnt load the correct cost of emblem of frost

Comments.Message: why do you think its not an issue and why do you close the issue?
